name: Riving Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Arcane Strike, ability to cast arcane spells.

sections.text: If you have a weapon that is augmented by your Arcane Strike feat, when you damage a creature with an attack made with that weapon, that creature takes a –2 penalty on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities. This effect lasts for 1 round.
sections.name: Benefits

description: When you infuse your weapon with arcane might, your attacks make foes more susceptible to magic.
